content: in the same row repeat increases 2 more times in every 11th row increases in total > 34 sts continue without further shaping until the sleeve measure 26 cm / 10 2 from the cast on edge place half of 6 sts on either side of the underarm centre on a piece of scrap yarn or a stitch holder set aside and knit the second sleeve in the same way yoke join body and sleeves as follows with a 6 0 mm / 10 us circular needle using color 1 place the last 3 sts and the first 3 sts of body on a stitch holder for the left underarm opening knit across the first left sleeve knit 40 sts from the body to form the front of the sweater place next 6 sts of the body on a stitch holder to form the underarm opening for the right hand sleeve knit across the second sleeve knit the remaining 40 sts of the body knit the yoke pattern and the decreases according to the yoke knitting chart change to a shorter circular needle when necessary when chart has been completed => 51 sts change to 5 0 mm / 8 us needle using color 3 knit 1 round decreasing 4 sts evenly spaced => 47 sts work seed stitch for 5 row bind off loosely finishing graft the underarm stitches of the body and the sleeves together weave in loose ends rinse the sweater by hand in lukewarm water and lay flat to dry in the right measurements copyright 2014 by maria vangen the pattern is for private use only the pattern images or products made from this pattern may not be sold without the express written consent of the designer if you have any questions or find any errors please contact me at maria vangen@gmail com thanks
